com.vectorprint.report.itext

Class DefaultElementProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.report.itext.DefaultElementProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementProducer, ImageLoader, LayerManager

    public class DefaultElementProducer
extends Object
implements ElementProducer, LayerManager
    Responsible for creating and styling parts of the report, for formatting data and adding data to the report part. For styling BaseStylers are used that can be found using a StylerFactory, Formatting data is done using a Formatter.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ADV
      prefix for generic tags used for advanced stylers.
      static String CHILD_LAYERSUFFIX
      the suffix used when starting a layer.

      • initLayerGroup

        public com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfLayer initLayerGroup(String layerId,
                                            com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas)
        Description copied from interface: LayerManager
        initialize a layer, whose purpose is to contain child layers added by LayerManager.startLayerInGroup(java.lang.String, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte). It is suggested to begin and end the layer in this method, without adding content to it
        Specified by:
        initLayerGroup in interface LayerManager
